digest:
- *SpikingBrain* introduces brain-inspired models for efficient long-context training, achieving significant speedups and low power operation. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.05276
- *Utility-Diversity Aware Online Batch Selection* improves LLM fine-tuning by balancing utility and diversity, enhancing efficiency and reducing training time. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.16882
- *A Deep Learning Framework for Real-Time Image Processing* enhances medical diagnostics, improving accuracy and speed across various modalities. Details here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.16611
- *DualTune* enhances local LLMs for tool calling by decoupling tasks, improving accuracy by 46% with efficient on-device orchestration. Explore: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00229
- *Harmony in Divergence* improves zeroth-order LLM fine-tuning, enhancing speed and memory efficiency while outperforming traditional methods. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.03304
- *RAVEN* enhances ad video violation detection using reinforcement learning, improving accuracy and generalization in real-world applications. Discover more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.16455
- *Trainable Dynamic Mask Sparse Attention* introduces a mechanism that enhances long-context modeling in LLMs with improved efficiency and adaptability. Read further: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.02124
- *Video Reasoning without Training* presents V-Reason, a method for video reasoning that improves model efficiency without training, using entropy-based tuning. More info: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17045
- *MoPHES* uses on-device LLMs for mobile mental health support, integrating state assessment and tailored recommendations for better user care. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.16085
- *Frugal Federated Learning for Violence Detection* compares LoRA-tuned VLMs and personalized CNNs, emphasizing energy efficiency and sustainability in AI deployment. Details: https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17651
